Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with bottleneck, large in size, and convex unstable base. Paste in an orangey colour. Exterior surface covered with a reddish coating. There is a zoomorphous decoration on the upper third of the body, where a schematic crododile appears on one side and a stylized plant design (double flower) on the other, all in red and defined by dark lines.
